Trade unions and politicians have already accused Sergio Marchionne of "blackmail" in pushing through a tough deal on working conditions at Fiat's flagship Mirafiori plant in Turin to save the factory from closure. Fiat is a great multinational which is growing in the world but its heart remains Italian, Industry Minister Paolo Romani said Saturday, adding, "All arguments are now closed. Romanni had said Monday that he would be asking Sergio Marchionne "to commit to investing in our country and remain with head and heart" in Italy. "Hydraulic hybrid vehicle technology is one more promising path worth pursuing in the effort to reduce our carbon footprint," Sergio Marchionne said. It has shown substantial increases in fuel economy when compared with traditional powertrains in the same type of vehicles. Both parties hope to reduce the size and complexity of the hybrid system and produce a technology that is sensitive to the needs of drivers for smooth and quiet operation.
